title: Eagles-Texans Recap + Week 9 Odds & Ends (Friday Fun Show)
itunes:title: Eagles-Texans Recap + Week 9 Odds & Ends (Friday Fun Show)
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Rachel Bonnetta share their final thoughts before the weekend's NFL action. First, they recap the Eagles beating the Texans on Thursday Night Football and improving to 8-0 on the season (3:00). Gregg takes over "It's About Me" and gives everyone his Cadence Rankings (23:00) followed by his injury minute with an update on Michael Thomas (28:00). Finally, the heroes look back at last week's predictions and make their Week 9 predictions (32:45). 

The Friday Fun Show airs live on YouTube at 10am PT/1pm ET/6pm BST every Friday.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
